review1: You were sensational! I realized that I can do more than I thought I could, I feel more inspired. I also made a list of 10 limiting beliefs that I changed to positive after. I think that every small step taken daily can bring change, especially when you find the right person to talk to. For the first time, after a long time, I didn't feel small and I felt appreciated for what I do and what I am. A big THANK YOU!
review2: The involvement you showed in your sessions helped me the most, precisely because of your energy of positivity, love and openness that reached me exactly where I needed to make that click. I want to thank you very much, since I had the sessions I have not deviated from absolutely anything you taught and supported me, and this is felt in every cell of my body. Exactly what I lacked, that constancy... that's exactly what I found in you and it helped me to implement it in myself.
review3: The sessions with Roxana made me discover many answers to the questions hidden very deep in my Being. And the best part is that from week to week I can get to know more new topics, which appear thanks to Roxana's well-pointed questions. I recommend everyone, regardless of age, to invest time and patience in themselves, together with the right people, eager to guide them towards the 'nothing to lose' version of themselves. For me it is Roxana.
